changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql:
with series as ( select generate_series(1, 100) as sery )
insert into relationships(created_at_utc, relationship_status) select '2022-01-01'::date + (FLOOR(random() * 300) + 1)::integer, case when s.sery % 2 = 0 then 'SAD'::relationship_status_enum when s.sery % 3 = 0 then 'OK'::relationship_status_enum else 'HAPPY'::relationship_status_enum end from series s
